items.title: Science Says Stop Asking ‘Will This Make Me Happy?’ and Start Asking Yourself This Instead
items.description: Predicting whether the outcome of a decision will make you happy is often impossible. Predicting a decision’s impact on you is not.

items.title: Developing This Leadership Skill Will Give Your Brand an Advantage
items.description: In today’s ‘attention economy,’ business leaders need to stand out to succeed. These four books show the way.

items.title: Steal This Brand’s Playbook for Revenue-Driving Events
items.description: In 2024, the women’s workwear brand M.M. LaFleur convinced more than 4,000 people to come out in-person, most of whom were new customers.

items.title: Nvidia and the U.S. Government Both Have Stakes in Intel Now
items.description: Intel stock surged after announcing a $5 billion deal with Nvidia.

items.title: 5 Brain Implant Companies Developing New Ways to Treat Disease
items.description: These pioneers are aiming to do challenging and important medical work. One has already implanted 54 patients.
